long_description: This atlas and gazetteer provides detailed maps of the entire state of Missouri. Covers all publicly-owned lands as well as ramps/docks, campgrounds, fishing, hunting and hiking areas; tips on estimating mileage while on trips. Includes historic sites/museums, information centers, national forests, scenic drives and unique natural features. Each map comprises 45-minutes of longitude and 45-minutes of latitude; covers approximately 36.7 miles wide by 51.8 miles high. One inch represents approximately 4 miles; scale is 1:250,000.
short_description: This atlas and gazetteer provides detailed maps of the entire state of Missouri.
